context: Hey I heard you're looking for movies what kind of recommendation would you like?
I enjoy movies with a lot of action.
Have you seen Deadpool (2016) this movie is action packed to the max. I can't wait to get to see Deadpool 2 (2018).
Yes I have seen Deadpool and you are right, its great. I'm also waiting on the second one
resp: Do you like Mark Wahlberg? He's in a great movie called Shooter (2007) , this movie is full of action and suspense. Edge of my seat the whole time.
